Package io.github.jgame.gui

Class ButtonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.gui.ButtonManager
  • public class ButtonManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles hovering over buttons and clicking them.

    Also see Group

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static Group buttons
      The group of all registered buttons to check for clicks and hovers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ButtonManager()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void blit​(java.awt.Graphics2D screen)
      Blit all sprites labled as "visible" in the group to the screen.
      static void mouseClicked​(Sprite mouseSprite)
      Call each sprite's onClick function accordingly.
      static void register​(Sprite bt)
      Add the sprite to the clickable sprites group.
      static void update​(Sprite mouseSprite)
      Call each sprite's updateHover function accordingly.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • buttons

        private static Group buttons
        The group of all registered buttons to check for clicks and hovers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonManager

        public ButtonManager()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register​(Sprite bt)
        Add the sprite to the clickable sprites group.

        This sprite's onClick and updateHover would be called accordingly by the ButtonManager

        Parameters:
        bt - Sprite to add

      • blit

        public static void blit​(java.awt.Graphics2D screen)
        Blit all sprites labled as "visible" in the group to the screen.
        Parameters:
        screen - Graphics to blit to.

      • update

        public static void update​(Sprite mouseSprite)
        Call each sprite's updateHover function accordingly. This should be called once per frame.
        Parameters:
        mouseSprite - Sprite to use for the mouse to check if the user is hovering over a specific sprite.

      • mouseClicked

        public static void mouseClicked​(Sprite mouseSprite)
        Call each sprite's onClick function accordingly. This should be called when the user clicks the mouse.
        Parameters:
        mouseSprite - Sprite used to track mouse. This determines which sprites are being clicked.
